comments.body: Ruby 2.6 is vendoring rb-bundler. I'll handle that problem in a separate set of PRs

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +16,20 @@    - gem install --norc -l -V --ignore-dependencies {{ name }}-{{ version }}.gem
    - gem unpack {{ name }}-{{ version }}.gem
  skip: {{ win or ruby == '2.6' }}

requirements:
